model

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents the Game Controller this class will send the instructions to the board or the score list

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public void shoot(java.lang.String shot)
           throws CannotShootException,
                  CornerException
        Method for sending shot information to the game board
        pre:
        post: Sends shot information to game board
        Throws:
        CannotShootException, - when the cell is not a border
        CornerException, - when he shot is a corner and the direction is not specified or wrong Direction is represented by an int 1=up, 2=down, 3= right, 4= left, 5= corner with wrong direction;
        CannotShootException
        CornerException

        Parameters:

        columns, - the amount of columns in the board
